inputs.name: templatePath
inputs.label: HTML template file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the template HTML file. Use placeholder *{body|s}* for the markdown HTML as well as additional placeholders that you can pass in as parameters.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: JSON Template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: JSON object with additional parameters for the HTML template. Use the parameters as *{pName}* in the HTML template.

inputs.name: htmlPath
inputs.label: HTML output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the output HTML file

inputs.name: htmlOutDir
inputs.label: HTML output folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path to output HTML files to. If empty, the source directories will be used.

inputs.label: Pass through HTML content unencoded
